mil3.7.4:1.3: “Duro kho, maharaja, ito brahmaloko kutagaramatta sila tamha patita ahorattena atthacattalisayojanasahassani bhassamana catuhi masehi pathaviyam patitthaheyya”ti.
mil3.7.4:2.2: ‘seyyathapi balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya;
mil3.7.4:2.3: evameva iddhima bhikkhu cetovasippatto jambudipe antarahito brahmaloke patubhaveyya’ti etam vacanam na saddahami, evam atisigham tava bahuni yojanasatani gacchissati”ti.
mil3.7.4:3.3: “Atthi, bhante, alasando nama dipo, tatthaham jato”ti.
mil3.7.4:3.6: “Abhijanasi nu tvam, maharaja, tattha kincideva karaniyam karitva sarita”ti?
mil3.7.4:3.8: “Lahum kho tvam, maharaja, gatosi dvimattani yojanasatani”ti.
